name: Coronokiavirus
description:
Description

You are a deadly virus with the ambition of human extermination. Force your infected wimps to cough on others to spread yourself. However, these weaklings can't withstand the deadliness of your virus for long. Make them spread it faster than they fall over!

Controls

Numpad keys for Omni-directional Precision Spit Expulsion.

Numpad 5 to remind your victim of embarrassing memories from the past, compelling him to stand still and reflect in shame.

(QWE, ASD, ZXC controls also work if you don't own a numpad)
